alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:54PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Albany and southwestern Converse Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 354 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campbell Creek Campground, or 23 miles southwest of Douglas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Friend Park Campground, Esterbrook, Curtis Gulch Campground, Campbell Creek Campground, Windy Peak and Boxelder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
